Direct Known Subclasses:
AeXPathAndExprNode, AeXPathOrExprNode, AeXPathUnionExprNode
public abstract class AeAbstractXPathBooleanNode
extends AeAbstractXPathNode

A base class that boolean xpath nodes extend (or, and, union, unary).

normalize

public AeAbstractXPathNode normalize()
Description copied from class: AeAbstractXPathNode
Default behavior for node normalization. This implementation normalizes the node's children and leaves itself unchanged.
